doc.ContractDescription: TRANSITING EXOPLANET SURVEY SATELLITE (TESS) PROJECT. THIS CONTRACT IS FOR PERFORMANCE OF THE PHASE B BRIDGE PHASE OF THE TESS MISSION. MAINTAIN COMPLETE TRACEABILITY AND CONFIGURATION CONTROL OF ALL TESS PROJECT REQUIREMENT DOCUMENTS. DELIVER DOCUMENTATION IN ACCORDANCE WITH CONTRACT REQUIREMENTS.

doc.ContractDescription: PM SOLDIER WARRIOR (PM SWAR) SUBMITTED A REQUIREMENT FOR THE ACQUISITION OF FOUR HUNDRED FIFTY-TWO (452) SQUAD POWER MANAGER (SPM) 622 ROLL KITS. THE LIGHTWEIGHT KIT PROVIDES EVERYTHING NEEDED TO CHARGE BB-2590 (ASIP), CONFORMAL BATTERIES, AND PRC-148/152 MBITR AND PRC-154 RIFLEMAN RADIO BATTERIES. THE KIT CAN ALSO POWER THE PRC-148 RADIO, DAGR, AND ANY CIGARETTE LIGHTER OR USB POWERED DEVICES DIRECTLY. ALL BATTERIES CAN BE CHARGED AND DEVICES POWERED FROM THE INCLUDED FOLDABLE SOLAR PANEL, WORLDWIDE AC POWER, CIVILIAN VEHICLES (VIA CIGARETTE PLUG), MILITARY VEHICLES (VIA NATO SLAVE PLUG), AND DISPOSABLE BATTERIES SUCH AS THE BA-5590 OR BA-5390. THE KIT IS PACKAGED IN A LIGHTWEIGHT YET RUGGED FABRIC ROLL KIT TO KEEP EVERYTHING ORGANIZED AND WITHIN EASY REACH IN ACCORDANCE WITH MFR PART NO. 006-660.
